sn1.5:1.2: Standing to one side, that deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.5:2.2: How many more should be developed?
sn1.5:2.3: How many chains must a mendicant escape
sn1.5:2.4: before you call them a flood-crosser?”
sn1.5:3.3: A mendicant must escape five chains
sn1.5:3.4: before you call them a flood-crosser.”
